cast.name: 马尔顿·帕特克斯 Márton Patkós
格盖利·瓦拉迪 Gergely Váradi

introduction: it follows 20-year-old Geri, who arrives in Budapest to begin his studies at the University of Economics, brimming with excitement and anticipation. On his first day at the dorm, he joins a group of young democratic opposition activists who organise protests against the communist system. The group is led by Zsolt Száva, a charismatic young student who soon becomes Geri’s best friend. The life of the country boy is changed overnight as he throws himself into a world of beautiful girls, wild parties and heated political debates.
